Module it.polimi.ingsw
Package it.polimi.ingsw.model

Class Lobby

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.model.Lobby
public class Lobby
extends java.lang.Object
The class representing the lobby of the game. A player enters the lobby after connecting to the server and here he can choose a room to join or create a new one. The lobby contains the list of rooms associated to the players.

    • createRoom

      public ModelResponse createRoom​(java.lang.String player, int maxPlayers, boolean simpleGame)
      Moves a free player into a new room, using that player as the owner
      Parameters:
      player - The player
      maxPlayers - The players needed to start the game
      simpleGame - True if the game should have gods
      Returns:
      the response - ModelResponse.ALLOW if the player can create a room

    • joinRoom

      public ModelResponse joinRoom​(java.lang.String player, java.lang.String owner)
      Moves a free player into an existing room
      Parameters:
      player - The player
      owner - The owner that identifies the room
      Returns:
      the response - ModelResponse.ALLOW if the player can join the room

      public java.util.Optional<Game> getGame​(java.lang.String player)
      Obtains the current game that the player is playing
      Parameters:
      player - The player
      Returns:
      Optional.empty() if there player is not in a game, the game otherwise
